title: Canyon De Chelly National Monument: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility          Â    WHEELCHAIR ACCESSIBILITY Several of the overlooks are wheelchair accessible on the rim drives:  Massacre Cave Overlook on the North Rim Tsegi Overlook on the South Rim Junction Overlook on the South Rim White House Overlook on the South Rim Spider Rock Overlook on the South Rim
